ch.hszt.mdp.chatplus.logic.contract.message
Interface IClientMessage

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoginMessage, ManageBoardMessage, SimpleMessage
public interface IClientMessage

Describes a message that must be processed in an IServerContext This kind of message is issued by a client towards the server.
